author: mpetrunic
content:
Can I get another set of eyes on this: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/170

author: jgm
content:
Is there a reason to add this to the v1 version of `blocks` and `state`, given that they are hard-coded to return phase0 versions of the objects?

Seems a bit odd to update a deprecated endpoint.

author: mpetrunic
content: Nah, will remove, it was find and replace in action, forgot we still keep deprecated definitions
